LanguageData.Apparel_WedgeShield.label: wedge shield
LanguageData.Apparel_WedgeShield.description: A cumbersome, heavy duty shield made of advanced alloys and designed to deflect all manner of sharp impacts and projectiles.
LanguageData.Apparel_BlastShield.label: blast shield
LanguageData.Apparel_BlastShield.description: A heavy shield made of advanced and plasteel nanosprings. Designed to withstand powerful explosions and deadly blunt impacts.
LanguageData.Apparel_EnergyShield.label: energy shield
LanguageData.Apparel_EnergyShield.description: An advanced shield made with Spacer shield emitters and designed defend against any incoming threat while remaining uncumbersome and unobtrusive.
